Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 111th/Normal
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, Wentworth, 115th, Halsted, & 111th, due to street blockage near 111th/Normal.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to debris on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to debris on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #56 Milwaukee bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
